page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER
page.content: LAW AND ORDER The Community Constable for Newlyn was born in 1947 in Redruth.He is based at Penzance Police Station.There are forty Policemen at the Station.There are ten Police Vehicles at Penzance.One of the most Common Crimes in Newlyn is the theft of Fishing equipment from the harbour and market.On average there are about twelve car accidents in Newlyn each year.On a typical day he spends a lot of his time making enquiries about lost or stolen property.Each day is different and he carries a radio to keep in contact with the station. He should work eight hours seven days in a row and then have two days off.He often works longer when needed.says he enjoys his job and says its the best job in the world.
